value: Used cell culture media and lysed cells. Purified exosomes kept at 4C no freezing. For fractionation, differential Centrifugation was done.
triplicate samples done. Cell RNAs also isolated

Coffey lab colorectal cancer DKS8 isogenic KRAS cell line exosomal RNAs. DKS8 isogenic cell lines that vary in KRAS status (Parent DLD1 G13D/+; DKO1 G13D/-; DKS8 +/-) had exosomes isolated from conditioned media and RNA (long and short were sequenced).
